title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server to pull, run and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with local models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers to talk with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM & chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React-based GUI to chat with Ollama models from the browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama supporting streaming, chat, embeddings and custom options.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for chatting with Ollama models written in Go; supports themes & markdown.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code suggestions via Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation example combining Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying, fine-tuning and integrating Ollama in real-world apps.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama providing DM and channel access to local LLMs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container image and Docker Compose templates for running Ollama with CUDA support.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing a TypeScript client for the Ollama local LLM server.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package – Python client for chatting, generating and embedding with Ollama.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for discussing Ollama models, troubleshooting and sharing integrations.
